sentences.english: Through the trial, was initially arrested the two men and Lim Yang.
sentences.chinese: 通過審訊，最初被抓獲的兩男子爲任某和楊某。

sentences.english: In the basement where Yang is living, there are many aisles leading to different rooms.
sentences.chinese: 在楊生活的這個地下室，有很多通道通往各個房間。

sentences.english: It was in the zoo that Xiao Yang met your sister.
sentences.chinese: 小楊昨天是在動物園碰到你妹妹的。

sentences.english: It's exactly the kind of bag Yang Jun aspires to own.
sentences.chinese: 這正是楊軍想要擁有的一款包包。

sentences.english: I saw an ostrich on Uncle Yang's farm.
sentences.chinese: 我在楊叔叔的農場裏看到了一隻駝鳥。

sentences.english: Mr Yang did a tensile experiment with a spring.
sentences.chinese: 楊老師用一根彈簧，做了一個拉力試驗。

sentences.english: Comrade Yang delivered the opening speech.
Zheng Deyang "good physics class, how to teach?"
sentences.chinese: 鄭德楊《物理好課，如何教？

sentences.english: Ms. Yang lives on the fifth floor.
Silhouettes flashed on Lash's display, confirming Yang's analysis.
sentences.chinese: 雷達側影在拉稀的顯示屏上閃爍，證實了楊的分析。

sentences.english: Mr. Yang Jiang is the history of Chinese literature has a unique style of the writer.
sentences.chinese: 楊絳先生是中國文學史上有着獨特風格的作家。

sentences.english: Give us help from trouble: for vain is the help of man.
sentences.chinese: 你把旌旗賜給敬畏你的人，可以爲真理楊起來。

sentences.english: But the Chinese authorities, including Foreign Minister Yang, are dealing with this matter as an individual case.
sentences.chinese: 但是中國當局，包括楊外長，都把這事當作個案。

sentences.english: Tonight after, he almost can affirm is Yang Mu You is secretly manipulating everything.
sentences.chinese: 今夜之後，他幾乎可以肯定是楊幕友在暗中操縱一切。

sentences.english: "Nothing, sir, " Yang answered as he pored over the data flashing on his screens.
sentences.chinese: “沒有異常，長官，”楊凝視着閃爍的顯示屏說道。
